::Astral/Griplash/Recklessa/Starlight::

Astral and his team arrive at the Cybertronian Fire, seeing the
closest two enemies to them (Tantrum and Rampage). The four bots flew
at them, firing. Astral fires a few shots from his laser rifle at
Rampage, Griplash fires two missiles at Tantrum, Recklessa fires two
missiles at Rampage, and Starlight fires three charges at Tantrum.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., Jeremiah <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> Headstrong/Tantrum/Sinnertwin
>
> Sinnertwin just jumped towards the fallend First Aid, unknowingly doging
> the blasts from Groove. As he fell towards first aid, one head
snarled, and
> the other spoke, "We'll rip out your slagging fuel pump, and EAT
IT", both
> mouths wide opend, he decended on his foe.
>
> Headstrong got his legs taken out from under him, by the force of
the shot
> to the torso. He tried to roll away from the searing blast of flame from
> Hot Spot, but was not very successful. He stood up, his front all
charred,
> and he pulled out his sword, and Plasma blaster. As soon as he
thouched his
> sword, his figuere became hollow, and four more joined it, standing
side by
> side. "SNORT* Lucky shot Autobot, but you won't *Snort* do it again" he
> said, firing three large burst of light balls from his gun.
>
> Tantrum landed near Rampage, and Transformed. "Here, refuel" he said, as
> one of his tanks opened for Rampage to dring from. While he did this he
> fired on Groove with his horns.
